definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: A carrier gas filter system is recommended to be installed on the Helium line (He).

sentences.english: If necessary, to increase filter, regular maintenance and the provision of a bypass pipeline.

sentences.english: For all gas lines, all joints shall be orbital welded to minimize pressure fittings.
sentences.chinese: 閥門與管路連接採用焊接式結構。

sentences.english: Results of experiments on the friction loss of conveying Bingham fluid in closed pipe are analysed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了官廳漿液在管路中輸送時的阻力試驗結果。

sentences.english: V-type electric control valve for regulating the pressure medium in pipelines and flow.

sentences.english: In this paper, a new method of pipe system design based on an aero-engine DMU is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了基於數字樣機的全新管路系統設計。

sentences.english: A directly inserting connection method for the irrigating pipeline on ground is disclosed.

sentences.english: The lower the temperature, the more water, in order to prevent the freezing of the water pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 氣溫越低越要多放水，以防上下水管路凍堵。

sentences.english: The auxiliary line shall consist of an approved backflow preventer and water meter.

sentences.english: Used for sealing pipe, and pipe.
sentences.chinese: 用來封閉管路，作用與管堵相同。

sentences.english: This article is an introduction of a new typed stopping valve powered by cylinder which controls the open-on and cut-off of a pipe.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了以氣缸爲動力源控制管路通斷的新型截止閥。

sentences.english: Products to shorten the pipeline, is in the process of design should consider.
sentences.chinese: 產品儘量縮短管路，是設計過程中應該考慮的問題。

sentences.english: Fully pour casing and inlet pipeline by liquid in order to eliminate air in them.
sentences.chinese: 給泵體和入口段管路注滿液體，以排出空氣。

sentences.english: Unscrew refrigerant line fastening screw for the compressor on the pressure damper .
